data.text:
The last movie I watched was called “Love Destiny” which is a movie from Thailand. This movie was adapted from the TV series of the same name last year. “Love Destiny” TV series was very famous and received lots of positive comments from audiences in Thailand as well as other Asian countries in 2018. After the success of the TV series, the film producer decided to make the next part based on the old plot. The movie is set in an historical context and is about the romance between Bhop and Garson (the two main characters). It also upholds the patriotism, solidarity and brave sacrifice of the Thai people at that time. One can say that the cast played their roles / performed very well and conveyed meaningful messages through the movie. Besides that, the humorous elements interwoven with the details of the film made the audience enjoy it and feel comfortable during the movie's screening time. Three weeks after it was released, the film’s ticket sales reached the top of the Thai movie market and earned quite a bit of money. Recently, the film producer has decided to make a sequel that will be named “Love destiny 3”, which should be released in 2023. I’m really looking forward to watching this movie. The picture below is the official poster of the movie.

This movie was adapted from the TV series of the same name last year. “Love Destiny” TV series was very famous and received lots of positive comments from audiences in Thailand as well as other asian countries in 2018. After success of the TV series, the film producer decided to make the next part that based on the old plot. The movie is set in historical context to tell the romance love between Bhop and Garson (two main characters). It also upholds the patriotism, solidarity, indomitable sacrifice of the Thai people at that time. One can say that the cast performed their roles very well for conveying meaningful messages of the movie. Besides that, the humorous elements interwoven in the details of the film made the audience enjoy and feel comfortable during the movie's screening time. After 3 weeks of releasing, the film’s ticket sales reached the top in the Thailand market and earned quite a bit revenue. Recently, the film producer has decided to make the next part that named “Love destiny 3” in 2023. I’m really looking forward to watching the movie. The picture below is the official poster of it.
